welcome.message: 👋 Willkommen auf unserem Server! Schau dich um und hab Spaß.

sections.title: §1. General Behavior
sections.description:
**Be respectful:** Treat others kindly. No insults or discrimination.
**No advertising:** Only promote in designated channels.
**No spam:** Avoid sending repetitive messages, emojis, or irrelevant links.
**No personal attacks:** Keep discussions respectful and on-topic.

sections.title: §2. Support
sections.description:
**Ask clear questions:** Provide enough detail for troubleshooting (error messages, screenshots, etc.).
**Use the correct channel:** Post questions in relevant channels (**#bug-reports**).
**Provide detailed bug reports:** Include all necessary information (bot name, steps to reproduce, error messages).
**Follow Discord’s Terms of Service:** Do not misuse bots or violate Discord rules.

sections.title: §3. Channel Usage
sections.description:
**Voice-Channel:** Use voice channels for conversations.
**No cross-posting:** Avoid posting the same content in multiple channels.

sections.title: §4. Privacy & Security
sections.description:
**No personal info sharing:** Don’t share sensitive details (passwords, emails, etc.).
**Stay safe:** Avoid clicking on suspicious links.

sections.title: §5. Violations
sections.description:
**Penalties:** Breaking the rules can lead to warnings, temporary bans, or permanent bans.
**Reports:** Report violations to moderators via our ticket system.

footer.title: Enjoy your time and thank you for following the rules!
